title: Frontend validation for admin gating after backend authorization fix

requirements.summary: Validate admin route gating in the UI using existing hooks so bootstrapped admins reach AdminDashboardPage while non-admins see the existing AccessDeniedScreen text.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as the bootstrapped admin, navigating to the Admin route renders the admin dashboard (not the access denied screen).
When logged in as a non-admin, navigating to the Admin route renders the existing access denied screen.

No edits are made to files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.

file_operations.description: Add a concise manual end-to-end QA checklist for verifying Admin route behavior after the backend authorization fix (bootstrapped admin vs non-admin) and explicitly note the immutable frontend paths that must not be edited when validating (hooks + main + components/ui).
